description: Kylee K9's offers a unique, adventure-based dog training experience. We are dedicated to creating balanced and happy canine companions through personalized training.
specialties: Trail Training (recall, trail manners, obedience, heel work)

services.name: Off-Leash Adventure Daycare
services.description: allows dogs learn and explore in a pack setting outdoors with 2-3 other dogs

services.name: Trail Training
services.description: focuses on building confidence, trust, obedience and discipline on hiking trails in a pack setting.

services.name: Solo Service
services.description: for puppies and young dogs, or adult dogs with more pressing behavioral issues that require one-on-one attention.

notice: All Solo Activities have a price increase from 10%-30%. Dogs are not considered for group activities until they are capable of following commands and working with other dogs without playing.
